info.name: Blue Hydrangeas in the Garbage Pile - Dark (Black)
info.description:
My black edit of Blue Hydrangeas in the Garbage Pile of Tumblr originally by rachael.css http://rhaegara.tumblr.com/

The original is on public domain license so I guess I'm allowed to post this but I can take it down. This also has a few misc updates for tumblr changes as I use it personally.
info.additionalInfo:
17/12/18 - fix new blue peepr background
16/08/21 - fixes for margins and changes
19/08/21 - fix new tumblr background color overrides and moz document
20/08/21 - fix header

Originally by rachael.css http://rhaegara.tumblr.com/

https://userstyles.org/styles/110568/blue-hydrangeas-in-the-garbage-pile-of-tumblr
